00082 void HorizontalWidget::CoordinatesChanged( cSunCoordinates coordinates )
00083 {
00084         m_azimuth = coordinates.dAzimuth;
00085         m_azimuthValue->setText( QString::number( m_azimuth ) );
00086         m_zenith = coordinates.dZenithAngle;
00087         m_zenithValue->setText( QString::number( m_zenith ) );
00088         
00089         //Azimuth Line update
00090         SoSeparator* azimuth = AzimuthLine();
00091         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 4, azimuth );
00092         
00093         //Zenith Line update
00094         SoSeparator* zenith = ZenithLine();
00095         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 5, zenith );
00096         
00097         //Star update
00098         SoSeparator* star = Star();
00099         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 6, star );
00100 }

00102 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::AzimuthLine()
00103 {
00104         //Azimuth Line
00105         SoSeparator* azimuth = new SoSeparator; 
00106         
00107         SoSeparator* azimuthLine = new SoSeparator; 
00108         azimuth->addChild( azimuthLine );
00109         
00110         SoMaterial* azimuthMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00111         azimuthMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 1.0, 0.0 );   // Green
00112         azimuthLine->addChild( azimuthMaterial );
00113         
00114         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00115         drawstyle->lineWidth = 3;
00116         azimuthLine->addChild( drawstyle );
00117         
00118         
00119         float azimuthPoints[360][3];
00120         for( int fi = 0; fi < 360; fi++ )
00121         {
00122                 double grad = ( m_azimuth / 360 ) * fi;
00123                 azimuthPoints[fi][0] = sin( grad * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* RADIO ;
00124         azimuthPoints[fi][1] =  0.0;
00125         azimuthPoints[fi][2] = -cos( grad * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO ;
00126                 
00127         }
00128         
00129         int azimuthLines[1] = {360};
00130         SoCoordinate3 * azimuthCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00131         azimuthCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 360, azimuthPoints );
00132         azimuthLine->addChild( azimuthCoord3 );
00133                 
00134         SoLineSet* line=new SoLineSet;
00135         line->numVertices.setValues( 0, 1, azimuthLines );
00136         azimuthLine->addChild( line );
00137         
00138         
00139         SoSeparator* curve = new SoSeparator;
00140         azimuth->addChild( curve );
00141         
00142         SoMaterial* curveMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00143         curveMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f );   // Green
00144         curve->addChild( curveMaterial );
00145         
00146         float curvePoints[270][3];
00147         Point3D center( 0, 0, 0 );
00148 
00149         int numPoints = 0;
00150         int indexes[360];
00151         for( int index = 1; index <= 90; index ++ )
00152         {
00153                 curvePoints[numPoints][0]= center.x;
00154                 curvePoints[numPoints][1]= center.y;
00155                 curvePoints[numPoints][2]= center.z;
00156                 indexes[ ( index -1 ) * 4 ] = numPoints;
00157                 numPoints++;
00158                 
00159                 double grad1 = ( m_azimuth / 360 ) * 4 * ( index -1 );
00160                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad1 * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* RADIO ;
00161         curvePoints[numPoints][1] =  0.0;
00162         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = -cos( grad1 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO ;
00163         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +1 ] = numPoints;
00164                 numPoints++;
00165                 
00166                 double grad2 = ( m_azimuth / 360 ) * 4 * index;
00167                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* RADIO ;
00168         curvePoints[numPoints][1] =  0.0;
00169         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = -cos( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO ;
00170         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +2 ] = numPoints;
00171                 numPoints++;
00172                 
00173                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) + 3 ] = -1;
00174         
00175         }
00176         
00177         
00178         SoCoordinate3 * curveCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00179         curveCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 270, curvePoints );
00180         curve->addChild( curveCoord3 );
00181         
00182         SoIndexedFaceSet* facet = new SoIndexedFaceSet;
00183         facet->coordIndex.setValues( 0, 360, indexes );
00184         curve->addChild( facet );
00185         
00186         return azimuth;
00187 }

00189 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::Ejes() const
00190 {
00191         SoSeparator* ejes = new SoSeparator;
00192         
00193         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00194         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);   // Red
00195         ejes->addChild(myMaterial);
00196         
00197         float p[6][3]={{0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, 
00198                                         {RADIO+20, 0.0, 0.0},
00199                                         {0.0, 0.0, 0.0},
00200                                         {0.0, RADIO+20, 0.0},
00201                                         {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, 
00202                                         {0.0, 0.0, RADIO+20}};
00203 
00204         SoCoordinate3* coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00205         coord3->point.setValues(0, 6, p);
00206         ejes->addChild(coord3);
00207         
00208         int lines[3]={2,2, 2};
00209         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00210         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,3,lines);
00211         ejes->addChild(lineset);
00212 
00213         return ejes;

00217 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::Horizon( int r ) const
00218 {
00219         float p[360][3];
00220         for( int fi = 0; fi<360; fi++ )
00221         {
00222                 p[fi][0] = -sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) )*r ;
00223         p[fi][1] =  0.0;
00224         p[fi][2] = -cos( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) )*r ;
00225                 
00226         }
00227         
00228         int lines[1]={360};
00229         SoCoordinate3 * coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00230         coord3->point.setValues(0, 360, p);
00231         SoSeparator* ecuador = new SoSeparator;
00232         ecuador->addChild(coord3);
00233                 
00234         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00235         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,1,lines);
00236         ecuador->addChild(lineset);     
00237         
00238         return ecuador;
00239 
00240         
00241 }

00243 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget ::Sphere() const
00244 {
00245         SoSeparator* sph = new SoSeparator;
00246   
00247         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00248         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );   // Blue
00249         myMaterial->transparency.setValue( 0.3f );
00250         sph->addChild( myMaterial );
00251         
00252         SoComplexity* complexity = new SoComplexity;
00253         complexity->value = 0.5;
00254         sph->addChild( complexity );
00255         
00256         SoSphere* sphere=new SoSphere;
00257         sphere->radius = RADIO;
00258         sph->addChild(sphere);
00259 
00260         return sph;
00261 }

00263 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::Star() 
00264 {               
00265         //Star definition
00266         SoSeparator* star = new SoSeparator;
00267         
00268         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00269         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 1.0, 0.0);   // yellow
00270         star->addChild(myMaterial);
00271         
00272         SoTranslation* starTransform = new SoTranslation;
00273         starTransform->translation.setValue( sin( m_zenith * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* sin( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO, 
00274                 cos( m_zenith * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO, 
00275                 -sin( m_zenith * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* cos( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) )  * RADIO ) ;
00276         star->addChild( starTransform);
00277         
00278         SoSphere* sphere=new SoSphere;
00279         sphere->radius=10;
00280         star->addChild(sphere);
00281         
00282         return star; 
00283 
00284 }

00345 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::ZenithLine()
00346 {
00347         
00348         SoSeparator* zenith = new SoSeparator; 
00349         
00350         SoMaterial* zenithMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00351         zenithMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 1.0, 0.0 );   // Green
00352         zenith->addChild( zenithMaterial );
00353         
00354         //Zenith Line
00355         SoSeparator* zenithLine = new SoSeparator;
00356         zenith->addChild( zenithLine );
00357         
00358         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00359         drawstyle->lineWidth = 4;
00360         zenithLine->addChild( drawstyle );
00361         
00362         float zenithPoints[360][3];
00363         
00364         double fi = m_azimuth;
00365         for( int theta = 0; theta< 360; theta++ )
00366         {
00367                 double grad = ( m_zenith / 360 ) * theta;
00368                 zenithPoints[theta][0] = sin( grad * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* RADIO;
00369         zenithPoints[theta][1] = cos( grad  * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO;
00370         zenithPoints[theta][2] = -sin( grad * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * cos( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO ;
00371         }
00372         
00373         
00374         int zenithLines[1] = {360};
00375         SoCoordinate3 * zenithCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00376         zenithCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 360, zenithPoints );
00377         zenithLine->addChild( zenithCoord3 );
00378         
00379         SoLineSet* line=new SoLineSet;
00380         line->numVertices.setValues( 0, 1, zenithLines );
00381         zenithLine->addChild( line );
00382         
00383         //Surface
00384         SoSeparator* curve = new SoSeparator;
00385         zenith->addChild( curve );
00386         
00387         float curvePoints[270][3];
00388         Point3D center( 0, 0, 0 );
00389 
00390         int numPoints = 0;
00391         int indexes[360];
00392         for( int index = 1; index <= 90; index ++ )
00393         {
00394                 curvePoints[numPoints][0]= center.x;
00395                 curvePoints[numPoints][1]= center.y;
00396                 curvePoints[numPoints][2]= center.z;
00397                 indexes[ ( index -1 ) * 4 ] = numPoints;
00398                 numPoints++;
00399                 
00400                 double grad1 = ( m_zenith / 360 ) * 4 * (index -1 );
00401                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad1 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sin( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* RADIO;
00402         curvePoints[numPoints][1] = cos( grad1  * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO;
00403         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = -sin( grad1 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * cos( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO ;
00404         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +1 ] = numPoints;
00405                 numPoints++;
00406                 
00407                 double grad2 = ( m_zenith / 360 ) * 4 * index;
00408                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sin( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* RADIO;
00409         curvePoints[numPoints][1] = cos( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO;
00410         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = -sin( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * cos( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * RADIO ;
00411         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +2 ] = numPoints;
00412                 numPoints++;
00413                 
00414                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) + 3 ] = -1;
00415         
00416         }
00417         
00418         
00419         SoCoordinate3 * curveCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00420         curveCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 270, curvePoints );
00421         curve->addChild( curveCoord3 );
00422         
00423         SoIndexedFaceSet* facet = new SoIndexedFaceSet;
00424         facet->coordIndex.setValues( 0, 360, indexes );
00425         curve->addChild( facet );
00426         
00427         
00428         return zenith;
